title.rendered: Amazon Ideal Customer with Jessica Totillo Coster of Ecommerce Badassery

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:54 — 26.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:54 — 26.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

We are still with Jessica Totillo Coster of Ecommerce Badassery. Some of the most important points we are tackling are emailing and building a lot of content around that and the misconception that Shopify is a marketplace. We have more in store for you today so stay tuned.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The two parts of a business
  • When talking to everyone means talking to no one
  • How to give up being “all things to all people”
  • How to show up as who you are and who you stand for
  • How to get ourselves on the phone/zoom calls
